Package kaitech.api.model

Interface Sale

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SaleImpl, SaleTblImpl.DbSale
    public interface Sale
    An interface that represents a sales record. A sales record is created whenever an order is made. It contains important details about the sale that is useful for data collection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      • addItemToOrder

        void addItemToOrder​(MenuItem item,
                    int quantity)
        Add the given item and its quantity to the order, where the item to be added does not currently exist in the order.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem to be added to the order.
        quantity - The quantity of the MenuItem to be added.

      • removeItemFromOrder

        void removeItemFromOrder​(MenuItem item)
        Remove the specified item from the order completely.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem to be removed from the order.

      • changeOrderedQuantity

        void changeOrderedQuantity​(MenuItem item,
                           int newQuant)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Changes the ordered quantity of the given item to the amount specified. Throws IllegalArgumentException when the MenuItem doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem to change the ordered quantity of.
        newQuant - The new quantity of the item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the MenuItem doesn't exist.

      • calculateTotalCost

        static org.joda.money.Money calculateTotalCost​(java.util.Map<MenuItem,​java.lang.Integer> order)
        Calculates the total cost of the order thus far, returning this amount. This is static such that the total can be calculated before confirming the order and making it a Sale object, in case the order is changed or cancelled.
        Parameters:
        order - A map of MenuItems to Integer quantities
        Returns:
        A Money amount

      • calculateChange

        static org.joda.money.Money calculateChange​(org.joda.money.Money total,
                                            org.joda.money.Money amountPaid)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates how much change should be given if the customer chooses to pay with cash. This is static such that the change can be calculated before confirming the order and making it a Sale object. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the amount paid is insufficient.
        Parameters:
        total - The total cost of the order
        amountPaid - The amount paid by the customer
        Returns:
        A Money object showing the change
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the amount paid is insufficient
